rationale: Record/replay (VCR.py or similar) adds complexity without sufficient benefit for this codebase
reasons: OpenAI responses are non-deterministic, making cassette matching unreliable
API response formats change frequently, requiring cassette maintenance
Most provider tests are already gated and skipped by default
The fast_sleep fixture and network guard provide sufficient speedup
Risk of committing secrets in cassettes outweighs benefits
alternatives_implemented: Network guard blocks outbound calls in unit tests
Provider tests are gated by environment variables
Smoke/main tiers exclude network tests by default
future_consideration: If OpenAI live tests become a bottleneck (>5 min), revisit with redacted cassettes
